fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Youth, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Support to EEB work for Italy 
Support to T&E work for Italy  
Currently advocating for ambitious NECD we have just coordinated a 24 Italian ngos letter to our Prime Minister and various Ministers involved to support ambitious air quality policies and targets
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
https://www.eeb.org    since October 2015 
https://www.transportenvironment.org/  since March 2016
goals__remit: Our NGO aims at creating a network in support of Clean Air policies in Italy, joining in various citizens groups spread around Italy to jointly advocate and achieve swift improvement  of air quality policies in Italy. Citizens for Air also wishes to bridge the gap between advocacy in favour of Clean Air and scientific reseach which is crucial to support the adoption of plans and programs that are consistent with emission reductions. It will also support robust European policies in favour of Clean Air through European NGOs. Citizens for Air believes in advocacy, environmental legal defense and citizenship participation in planning and participatory science projects
relevant_communication:
We have contributed with notes on the Milan sustainable mobility plan requesting additional scenary data to reduce air pollution human exposure in the next years in Milan, Italy, we have now launched an air quality 10 points manifesto in support of air quality on occasion of the new admnistrative  elections of the Lombardy regional elections, we are monitoring the Dieselgate issue on the Italian side. 
We are envisaging to prepare members of parliament network in support of air quality and a network of NGOs. Carrying out extensive citizens science work in Italy
